over25.text: How will you split the contribution with your qualifying workers?
triggerText: split the contribution with your qualifying workers
helpText: Since you have 25 or more qualifying workers, you are required to pay at least 60% of the medical leave portion. You are free to pay a larger portion of the contribution if you wish to do so.

under25.text: How will you split the contribution with your qualifying workers?
triggerText: split the contribution with your qualifying workers
helpText: Since you have fewer than 25 qualifying workers, you are not required to pay the employer share unless you choose to do so.
